lmhupdate module¶

This is the entry point for the Local Math Hub utility.

usage: lmhupdate [-h] [repository [repository ...]]
Positional arguments:
repository a list of repositories for which to show the status.
lmhupdate.add_parser(subparsers)¶
lmhupdate.add_parser_args(parser)¶
